page.title: 05Celebration of Guiding 75yrs
page.content: {Celebration of Guiding 1910- 1985. Various events in which Salfords children have taken part.Large service held at Crystal Palace, Brownies and Guides from all over attended. {'Light Ceremony'-}torch lit by Princess Margaret at Buckingham Palace and carried to all districts.Salfords joined East and West Horley for Light ceremony, lined route with flags to welcome car carrying torch. Held{Victorian Day}-children dressed in Victorian costume as they were 75 years ago.Held Bar.B.Q. - walk before hand with parents. {Brownie and Cub Fun Day}-challenge each other to fun and games all day. {Brownie Revels},all Brownies in district get together for fun, games and competition to win a shield.
